Home.title: Padma Web Booking
Home.description: Book Padma Hotel rooms with ease
Home.myBookingDesc:
You can view, modify, or cancel a booking.
Please type the email address you used during booking and the confirmation number you received from us:
Home.whyUs1: Advertised rate is inclusive of tax & service charge, daily breakfast
Home.whyUs3: Deposit is equal to first night rate
Home.whyUs4: Flexibility to cancel reservation up to 7 days prior to arrival date without any penalty
Home.whyUs5: Complimentary Facilities: Wi-Fi access throughout the resort, Gym, Kids Club & Parking Area.
Home.whyUsNote: 7 days cancellation flexibility may not apply to certain room offer such as advance booking promotion (Advance Purchase Rate)
Home.address: Address: Jl. Padma No.1, Legian - Bali 80361. INDONESIA
Home.rateCalendarHint: Please select hotel, if you want to see best price
Home.verificationExpiredDesc: A verification email is only valid for 1 hour.
Home.voucherDialogDesc: If you have a voucher code available, you can enter it below to unlock special rates.
Home.enterYourCode: Enter your code & enjoy special offers for you.
Home.betterRateAwait: Better Rate Await on Padma Hotel Apps
Home.floatingBannerTitle: Better Rates Await on Padma Hotels App
Home.floatingBannerDesc: Get exclusive offers and rewards when you book through the Padma Hotels Apps. Download the Padma Hotels Apps on:

SignUp.title: Create a Padma Account
SignUp.description: Complete the data below to create an account
SignUp.passwordCombination: The password combination must be uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters.
SignUp.makeSure: Make sure your email is active because we will send a verification link.

validation.password: Password does not meet the specifications.
validation.phone: Please enter a valid phone number

SignUp.consent: I understand and agree with the <terms>Terms & Conditions</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>
SignUp.verifyEmailSentDesc: Check your email to verify your account.

AccountVerified.title: Account has been Verified
AccountVerified.desc: Email verified successfully, please login to explore Padma Hotels.

Search.noRoomsTitle: No Availability for Your Selected Dates
Search.noRoomsDesc: Unfortunately, no rooms are available for your selected dates. Please try different dates or explore other Padma Hotels.

Reservation.title: Reservation Summary
Reservation.desc: Make sure all the details on this page are correct before proceeding to payment.
Reservation.loginCTA: Get exclusive deals and more benefits by logging in.
Reservation.specialRequestPlaceholder: Please type your special request here
Reservation.specialRequestHint: Special requests are based on availability and may incur additional charges.
Reservation.specialRequestRemarksHint: * Requests are not guaranteed and are subject to availability.
Reservation.fillPreferences: Please fill in and choose your preferences
Reservation.selectPreferences: Select your preferences & help us serve you better
Reservation.notMemberYetDesc: By checking this box, I confirm my enrolment in the Padma Resident programme and agree to the <terms>Terms & Conditions</terms>
Reservation.firstStay: Is this your first time to stay with us?
Reservation.bookingAgreement: By completing this booking you agree to the <terms>booking terms</terms> and <privacy>privacy policy</privacy>
Reservation.roomNoLongerAvailableDesc: Weâ€™re sorry, the room you selected has just been booked by another guest. Please start a new search to view the latest availability.
Reservation.loginSuccessfulDesc: Youâ€™re now logged in. Enjoy special discounted rates available exclusively for registered users.
Reservation.inputYourPadmaPINDesc: The PIN is used to protect transactions on your account.

MyBooking.title: My Booking
MyBooking.desc: Displays a userâ€™s reservation history with options to view details, modify, or cancel bookings.
MyBooking.error: Weâ€™re experiencing a brief interruption. Please try again shortly.

BookingDetail.title: Payment Details
BookingDetail.desc: Booking has been created. Please pay before
BookingDetail.isThisYourFirstTime: Is this your first time to stay with us?
BookingDetail.isThisYourFirstTimeDesc: This is our first visit to Padma Resort
BookingDetail.cancellationPolicy: This reservation is free cancellation until 20 Feb 2023 18:00 (Local Time). Cancellations after that, will forfeit Deposits Room & Point.
BookingDetail.cancellationPolicy2: This reservation can be modified until 20 Feb 2023 18:00 (Local Time).
BookingDetail.cancellationPolicy3: Once your payment is confirmed, we will send yor receipt to your email address.
BookingDetail.cancellationReasonDesc: Please input cancellation reason for confirmation.
BookingDetail.paymentExpiredDesc: Payment cannot be processed. The payment deadline has expired
BookingDetail.inclusionContent: Breakfast, Club Benefits, complimentary Wi-Fi access throughout the resort, return airport transfers for min. 2 nights (please provide flight details to the hotel no later than 72-Hours prior to arrival or pick-up service will not be provided), 10% Discount for any Theme Dinner (except Christmas and New Year's Eve Dinner) and all applicable taxes..
BookingDetail.paidAmountDesc: Payment will be completed upon check in
BookingDetail.hotelResortNotFoundDesc: Sorry, rooms you want is not available for the date. You can choose other or stay with current date.

Error.description:
We've unfortunately encountered an error.

You can try to reload the page you were visiting.
Error.title: Something went wrong!

IndexPage.description: This is a basic example that demonstrates the usage of next-intl with the Next.js App Router. Try changing the locale in the top right corner and see how the content changes.
IndexPage.title: next-intl example

NotFoundPage.description: Please double-check the browser address bar or use the navigation to go to a known page.
NotFoundPage.title: Page not found

links.aboutDesc: Find more about our hotels & services.
links.myBookingDesc: Track your bookings and manage your stays.
links.privacyNoticeDesc: Information on our data privacy and protection practices.

source.description: Browse the source code of this example on GitHub.

PathnamesPage.description:
The pathnames are internationalized too.

If you're using the default language English, you'll see /en/pathnames in the browser address bar on this page.

If you change the locale to German, the URL is localized accordingly (/de/pfadnamen).
PathnamesPage.title: Pathnames
